class.name: AbstractDifferentiableOptimizer

javadoc.text: Base class for implementing optimizers for multivariate scalar * differentiable functions. * It contains boiler-plate code for dealing with gradient evaluation.

javadoc.param: evaluationPoint Point at which the gradient must be evaluated.
javadoc.return: the gradient at the specified point.
